creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: Gnarly tree in moonlight. Tree is full of plum blossoms. To lower right corner are blue/green rocks. Some green bamboo leaves also around the rocks and bottom of tree trunk. Can see partial moon in back of tree at a little above center of composition to the left. Moon is partial because is also hidden behind a branch with blossoms.
title: Pink and White Plum Blossoms in Moonlight
